insert into sectiontable(idClassTable, idStatusTable, sectionDay) values (#idClassTable#, #idStatusTable#, #sectionDay#)
select last_insert_id() as idUserTable
sqlMap.select: select sec.idSectionTable, c.classStartTime, c.classEndTime, s.styleName, sec.sectionDay, u.userFirstName, u.userLastName from classtable as c join styletable as s ON (c.idStyleTable = s.idStyleTable) JOIN usertable as u ON(u.idUserTable = c.idUserTable) JOIN sectiontable as sec WHERE sec.idClassTable = c.idClassTable;

select sec.idSectionTable, c.classStartTime, c.classEndTime, s.styleName, sec.sectionDay, u.userFirstName, u.userLastName from classtable as c join styletable as s ON (c.idStyleTable = s.idStyleTable) JOIN usertable as u ON(u.idUserTable = c.idUserTable) JOIN sectiontable as sec WHERE sec.idClassTable = c.idClassTable AND sec.idSectionTable = #idSectionTable#;
